#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{   long long int g, r, t,i,x,sumf,sum,j;
 long long int o,z;
 //w=m-48;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
 
        scanf("%lld",&z);
       // x=strlen(z);
        sum=10000000;
       o=z;
       while(sum>24)
       {
 
       sum=0;
       while(o!=0)
       {
           g=o%10;
           sum=sum+g;
           o=o/10;
 
       }
       if(sum>24)
       o=sum;
       //printf("%d\n",sum);
       }
       //printf("%lld",sum);
 
        //printf("sumis %ld",sum);
    sumf=0;
 
        if(z<=24)
            printf("%lld\n",z);
        else
        {
            printf("%lld\n",sum);
 
        }
 
        /*else
        {
            while(sum!=0)
            {
                r=sum%10;
                sumf=sumf+r;
                sum=sum/10;
 
            }
            printf("%lld\n",sumf);
        }*/
 
    }
 
    return 0;
}
